attributes.action: Revoke Article 50 and change it to come out with a better deal for GB.
attributes.background: May has made a mockery of her No Deal Brexit that she planned for Article 50, it’s time to fight back and stand up to democracy and give the British public the right deal that should of happened for Brexit.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what changes you'd like to the withdrawal agreement. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to sign and share one or more of these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233020
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/237632
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233483
